@andrewvoerman yeah, as long as they're winning... @Sportsfreakconz
@andrewvoerman also, the future of ODI cricket is rosy. CWC is still by far the biggest revenue earner on the ICC calendar @Sportsfreakconz

@andrewvoerman just as we saw when they sent a weakened ODI squad to RSA and were cleaned out 5-nil... @Sportsfreakconz
